top.header: Let us deliver your dream car from the USA

text.first: We deliver to three strategic destinations—Klaipeda, Rotterdam, and Poti—ensuring reliable.
text.second: Efficient logistics to key hubs across Europe and the Caucasus region.

bottom.text: Your trusted partner in vehicle logistics across Atlantic ocean.

modal.text1: Are you sure you want bid
modal.text2: By confirming the Auction Order, you are submitting an offer to T-AutoLogistics to place a bid on a vehicle up to your chosen amount. Upon confirmation of this operation by clicking the 'Confirm Order' button, T-AutoLogistics will proceed with the execution of the order and will bid on your behalf for the purchase of the selected vehicle at the auction house during the live auction. This operation cannot be undone. Before confirming,please read the Rules.
modal.text4: See the current bid on the auction before you bid!
modal.error: Your bid must be higher than current bid

reservation.warning: The price is show with delivery to Klaipeda. All import taxes, unloading fee, etc. are NOT included

modal.text1: Are you sure you want to make a Reservation
modal.text2: Before reserving a car, please read the terms and conditions: a $1000 deposit is required for the reservation. The deposit is non-refundable if the remaining amount is not paid within 3 business days. By reserving a car, you agree to these terms.

winner.text1: Congratulations, you have won the auction!
winner.text2: View the car page on the profile page in the vehicle tab.

modal.warning: If you have any questions, you can contact the support operator.

dots.header: The dots next to the documents will help you understand what a particular document means
dots.green: Export possible / registration in Europe possible with current documentation
dots.red: Export possible / registration in Europe impossible with current documentation
dots.black: Export impossible / registration in Europe impossible with current documentation
dots.yellow: Export impossible / registration in Europe impossible with current documentation
dots.doubleRed: Additional processing required for export - extra cost 200$-800$ / registration in Europe impossible with current documentation

salesDocuments.firstClue: There may be certain requirements for exporting cars from specific ports. Some BOS vehicles need to be transferred from their dedicated terminals to others in order to be eligible for export.
salesDocuments.secondClue: Open lien - If the insurance company has paid off the lien, we are able to request a lien release letter. However, if there is still an outstanding balance owed to the lienholder, the vehicle must be returned to the auction for immediate resale. This is the buyer's risk.
salesDocuments.thirdClueFirstPart: Flood vehicles with regular salvage but flood branding have been marked as possible for export (green -
salesDocuments.thirdClueSecondPart: however, registration may be denied by some Europe DMVs.

basicPlan.description: This plan is perfect for getting started. You can bid on one lot at a time, and with a deposit of just 1,500 USD, you'll have a bidding power of 10,000 USD.

professionalPlan.description: This plan lets you step up your bidding game. With a deposit of 2,500 USD, you’ll get a bidding power of 25,000 USD and the ability to bid on up to two lots at a time, as long as each bid does not exceed 10,000 USD.

enterprisePlan.description: Our premium plan gives you full bidding flexibility. With a deposit of 5,000 USD, you’ll receive a bidding power of 50,000 USD. You can bid on up to five lots at the same time (if each bid does not exceed 10,000 USD), with a maximum bid of 50,000 USD per lot.

note.description: If you have chosen the Enterprise plan and find that your deposit has fallen below $1,000, don't feel bad! You will have the opportunity to re-purchase any of the plans we offer.

goodNews.description: If you’ve already chosen the Basic Plan with a deposit of 1,500 USD and decide to move up to the Professional Plan with a deposit of 2,500 USD, you won’t need to pay the full amount again. You’ll only cover the difference between the two plans — in this case, just 1,000 USD. The same applies when upgrading to the Enterprise Plan, or when moving from any plan to a higher one. You’ll always pay only the difference in deposit amounts, not the full cost of the new plan. Upgrading has never been easier — step up your bidding power without unnecessary extra costs!

alert.text: Don't miss our video about customs procedures! Click and learn more!

welcome.description: Welcome to bidauto.online , your premier gateway to the vast world of vehicles from the USA. At the heart of our mission lies a simple, yet profound passion for cars and the endless opportunities the USA presents in the automotive industry.

ourJourney.description: Our journey into this dynamic sector began in 2008, marked by the graduation of our CEO, Tautvydas Lukauskas, from high school. Fueled by an unwavering interest in both cars and the USA, Tautvydas ventured into the realm of car brokering, setting the stage for what would become a renowned name in vehicle procurement and delivery.

dedication.description: Over the years, our dedication to providing top-notch delivery services from the USA to any corner of the globe has earned us immense success, especially on social media platforms in our home country, Lithuania, in 2023. This success has been a catalyst for evolution, inspiring us to innovate and introduce IT solutions that revolutionize the way people purchase cars from USA auctions. Our aim has always been to ensure transparency, clarity, and detailed explanations of all fees and expenses involved in the car buying process.

latestInovation.description: Today, we are proud to introduce our latest innovation: an online car auction broker system that showcases over 100,000+ vehicles for sale every day. Our platform offers a diverse range of vehicles, including clean title and salvage title cars, pickup trucks, electric cars, luxury vehicles, SUVs, ATVs, motorcycles, and boats. And the best part? You can access this vast inventory without the need for a dealer license.

hassleFree.description: We are dedicated to making the car auction process hassle-free, enjoyable, and safe for everyone involved. Beyond providing a superior bidding experience, we guarantee the delivery of your purchased vehicles to any location worldwide. Our commitment to excellence doesn’t end there; we are always ready to address any questions or concerns you may have.

joinUs.description: At bidauto.online , we are not just about facilitating vehicle purchases; we are committed to changing the car auction process for the better. Join us on this journey and discover the difference that comes with choosing a partner who is genuinely committed to your satisfaction and success in the automotive world.

termsOfUse.header: Terms and Conditions of Use / Legal Disclaimer
termsOfUse.description: These Terms and Conditions govern the use of BidAuto.online services, which act as a broker between auction platforms and logistics providers for the purchase, transport, and export of vehicles.

brokerRole.description: BidAuto.online acts solely as an independent broker and logistics facilitator between third-party automotive auction platforms (including but not limited to Copart, IAAI, and Manheim) and international shipping and freight companies.

details.nonOwnership: BidAuto.online does not own, sell, or represent ownership of any vehicle listed on these auction platforms.

list: Providing authorized access to auction platforms for registered buyers.
Coordinating vehicle retrieval from auction facilities and transportation to export terminals.
Processing vehicles at export terminals, obtaining and forwarding available documentation (if issued by the auction or seller).
Organizing container loading and arranging maritime shipment to the customer’s chosen destination.

details.legalBasis: BidAuto.online operates as an intermediary ('broker') under U.S. Uniform Commercial Code (UCC), Title 15 of the United States Code, and applicable Federal Maritime Commission (FMC) export guidelines.
details.responsibility: All purchase, sale, and title transfer responsibilities rest entirely with the auction platform and the buyer.

asIsCondition.description: All vehicles purchased through IAAI, Copart, or similar salvage auctions are sold strictly 'As Is, Where Is', with no warranty, express or implied.
asIsCondition.disclaimer: Neither the auction nor BidAuto.online assumes responsibility for the mechanical condition, completeness, or roadworthiness of any vehicle.

list: Vehicles may contain hidden or undisclosed damages not visible in photos or condition reports.
Vehicles may not comply with safety, emissions, or registration standards in the destination country.
Buyers accept all risks associated with repair, transport, and importation.

titleAndDocumentation.description: BidAuto.online cannot and does not guarantee the presence, validity, or accuracy of title documents or their eligibility for export.
titleAndDocumentation.responsibility: Responsibility for verifying title status (including liens, salvage classifications, or export restrictions) lies solely with the buyer and auction.

notLiableFor.header: Neither Copart, IAAI, nor BidAuto.online shall be held liable for:
list: Missing titles or delays in title issuance.
Invalid or non-exportable documents (e.g., 'Bill of Sale,' 'Non-Repairable,' or 'Certificate of Destruction').
Customs rejections or import denials based on documentation issues.

transportationAndShipping.description: Vehicles purchased through these auctions are generally insurance total-loss or salvage write-offs.
transportationAndShipping.liability: BidAuto.online and its logistics partners assume no liability for:
notLiableFor: Damage, loss, or deterioration during inland or maritime transport.
Acts of nature, loading incidents, port handling, or storage-related damage.
transportationAndShipping.regulations: All transport is arranged at the buyer’s risk, in accordance with FMC regulations, CFR Title 46 (Shipping), and INCOTERMS 2020 where applicable.
transportationAndShipping.insurance: Insurance coverage during shipment must be arranged separately by the buyer unless explicitly stated otherwise in a written agreement.

disputeResolution.description: All purchases made through Copart or IAAI are governed by their respective Buyer Agreements and Terms of Use, which the buyer must review and accept prior to bidding.

userAgreement.header: By utilizing BidAuto.online services, you acknowledge and agree that:
list: BidAuto.online is not a party to the auction contract between buyer and auction house.
Any claims or disputes regarding vehicle condition, title validity, or sale terms must be addressed directly with the auction platform.
Any claims arising from export logistics shall be subject to the laws of the United Arab Emirates, under which BidAuto.online’s operating entity (NAVI GRUPE LLC-FZ) is registered.

legalCompliance.description: The buyer acknowledges that all exports and imports must comply with applicable laws and regulations.

list: All exports must comply with U.S. Customs and Border Protection (CBP) regulations under 19 CFR §192.2, governing the export of used self-propelled vehicles.
It is the buyer’s sole responsibility to ensure the vehicle’s compliance with destination country import regulations, emissions, or tax requirements.
BidAuto.online does not engage in or support any document falsification, title alteration, or other unlawful export activities.

legalCompliance.agreement: By purchasing and arranging transport through BidAuto.online, you agree to these Terms and Conditions and affirm that you have read and accepted the auction rules of Copart, IAAI, or any platform through which the purchase was made.

warnings.address: Add your address so we can deliver your order to you

modal.description: By depositing funds on bidauto.online, I consent to the terms and conditions governing the use of the platform, including the processing of personal data in accordance with applicable laws and regulations.
